doctitle.textblock: Municipal Interest Rates for First Quarter of 1994

action.textblock: Notice of interest rates for the first quarter of 1994.

summary.textblock: REA hereby announces the interest rates for municipal rate loans with interest rate terms beginning during the first calendar quarter of 1994.

date.textblock: These interest rates are effective for interest rate terms that commence during the period beginning January 1, 1994, and ending March 31, 1994.

further.textblock: Sue Arnold, Management Analyst, U.S. Department of Agriculture, Rural Electrification Administration, room 2230-s, 14th Street & Independence Avenue, SW., Washington, DC 20250-1500. Telephone: 202-720-0736. FAX: 202-720-4120.

supplem.textblock: On December 20, 1993, at 58 FR 66260, REA published a rule establishing a program for electric loans at municipal interest rates. Pursuant to 7 CFR 1714.5 of this rule, the interest rates on these municipal rate loans are based on indexes published in the ``Bond Buyer'' for the four weeks prior to the first Friday of the last month before the beginning of the quarter. In accordance with 7 CFR 1714.5, the interest rates are established as shown in the following table for all interest rate terms that begin at any time during the first calendar quarter of 1994.
